title: What was the biggest BTS concert by capacity? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Biggest Concert In Capacity of Tickets Sold: Note: The Number of Tickets sold is not the number of overall venue capacity. | 1st Place - Wembley Stadium in London, England, United Kingdom Tour: Love Yourself: World Tour Speak Yourself Extension (June 1 and 2, 2019)   57,291.5‬ Tickets Sold Per Show | 2nd Place - Rose Bowl in Pasadena, California, United States of America (May 4 and 5, 2019) Love Yourself: World Tour Speak Yourself Extension   56,520 tickets sold per show | 3rd Place - Stade de France in Paris, France. Love Yourself World Tour: Speak Yourself Extenstion (Jun 7 and 8, 2019)   53,664 tickets sold per show. | 4th Place - Shizuoka Stadium ECOPA in Shizuoka, Japan Love Yourself World Tour: Speak Yourself Extension (July 13 and 14, 2019)  53,576.5 tickets per show. | 5th Place - Yanmar Stadium Nagai in Osaka, Japan Love Yourself World Tour: Speak Yourself Extension (July 6 and 7, 2019)  50,777 tickets per show. | 6th Place - Tokyo Dome in Tokyo, Japan Love Yourself World Tour: November 13 and 14, 2018   Estimated Tickets sold per concert: 45,000 - 50,000 | 7th Place - MetLife Stadium in East Rutherford, New Jersey, United States of America. Love Yourself World Tour: Speak Yourself Extenstion (May 18 and 19, 2019)   49,287 tickets per show - 8th Place - Kyocera Dome Osaka in Osaka, Kansai, Japan. The Wings Tour (October 14 and 15, 2017) Love Yourself World Tour (November 21, 24 & 24, 2018) Japan Official Fanmeeting Vol.5 ~Magicshop~ (December 14 & 15, 2019)   Estimated Tickets sold per show: 37,500 - 45,000 - 9th Place - Seoul Olympic Stadium in Seoul, South Korea Love Yourself World Tour (August 25 & 26, 2018) Love Yourself World Tour: Speak Yourself Extension Final (October 26, 27 & 29, 2019)   Estimated Tickets Per Show: 43,000 - 45,000 - 10th Place - Allianz Parque in Sao Paulo, Brazil Love Yourself World Tour: Speak Yourself Extension (May 25 & 26, 2019)   Tickets Sold Per Show: 42,364 - Images from Uncle Google, Ticketing Data from Media Reports, and Billboard Boxscore.

I’ll add to that other answer. They are booked for a show at the Wembley Stadium in London, UK. It is a soccer stadium currently owned by Tottenham Hotspur FC with a capacity of 90,000. I’ve never heard of Rose Stadium, but the official rankings of highest capacity stadiums in the world are: 15) Rose Stadium - 92,542 17) Wembley Stadium - 90,000 The world’s 20 largest sporting stadiums For a perspective on those numbers, second highest capacity stadium is 113,065. First one is in North Korea.
